==Description==
The <code>edit_terms</code> is actually an action is used to hook into code <b>before</b> a term is updated in the database. It can be used similar to a filter in that you can take action before database updates are made. The documention for this hook as been properly moved into the Action_Reference.

Moved to [[Plugin_API/Action_Reference/edit_terms|Plugin_API/Action_Reference/edit_terms]]
